description:
Do you want to build your business but you don't like selling? Want to learn branding strategies and brand awareness marketing that sells more books, courses and programs 24-7? You are in the right place because this high quality and interactive course by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning was created for you and recently updated April 1, 2016.

Business Branding 101: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7 is for you if:

  • You are an Author, Trainer, Coach or Consultant ready to build your brand.
  • You see the money making potential of branding your business as the only solution for your readers, students and clients but you want the best step-by-step guidance for how to get started.
  • You want brand marketing best practices, building a brand templates and easy brand marketing formulas that have already been tested and proven to work.
  • You would like to build brand awareness and loyalty so that you can boost your book, course and program sales plus connect with your ideal target market prospects.
  • You would like to know how you can develop brand strategies without spending thousands of dollars.
  • You are ready to build your brand and use brand marketing to easily sell books, courses and programs online.

**************************************************************************************************************

Why take Business Branding 101: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7?

  • This is why you are here because you want brand strategies that build brand awareness and loyalty so you can sell more in the shortest amount of time without it costing you a small fortune.
  • The best part is; every piece of branding advice, brand strategy and logical approach to brand marketing has been tested; none of this is theory.

************************************************************************************************************

What is covered in Business Branding: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7?

  1. Discover brand strategies designed for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants who want to be the only buying solution in the eyes of their prospective readers, students and clients.
  2. Develop business building branding specific for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants that set you up for success; both online and offline.
  3. Building a brand can be easy when you follow our brand guidelines, brand identity design formulas and brand image makeover plan for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants
  4. Brand marketing strategy designed for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants that build brand awareness and are easy brand marketing solutions that help you sell more.
  5. Step-by-step branding building strategies that build your brand online and set you up as the only solution for your readers, students, clients and customers.
  6. Building a brand coaching and brand marketing consulting that guides you past your brand struggles and helps you develop a solid business brand that people remember; in a good way.
  7. Walk away with a branding success plan designed for Authors, Trainers, Coaches and Consultants

******************************************************************************************************************

How does Business Branding 101: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7 benefit you?

  • In this course, you learn the exact steps you need to know to make brand marketing work for you in a short amount of time. You receive a building a brand formula that you can follow for success.
  • You get easy brand marketing solutions and insights that only a professional with my background can give you. You get the inside track on what you need to do to succeed online plus what you need to do to follow through.
  • If that's something you would like to achieve, you have selected the right course to take. If you complete this entire course and implement everything you learn you will have a completed brand and brand marketing strategy that you can follow to get more prospects to visit your website and join your list or buy from you.
  • Remember, it doesn't matter if you are new or already in full swing, I've been there and I can show you exactly what you need to do to make it happen.

**************************************************************************************************************

When Can You Take Business Branding 101: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7?

  • What are you waiting for? If you’re looking for a course to learn what it takes to build a successful business brand that people instantly connect with, then look no further.
  • Start learning right now or take the course when it is convenient for you! The course can be accessed 24-7 from most devices with an internet connection.
  • Once a member of the course, you receive lecture updates, advice and coaching guidance for life; NO EXTRA COST TO YOU.
  • REMEMBER: If you are not completely satisfied, you can get a full money back refund, so long as you request it within 30 days of purchase – No questions asked.
  • Click on the "Take This Course" button and start learning instantly

*****************************************************************************************************************

Still not convinced? Make sure you watch some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about the course and more about me your instructor. Plus you can check out some of the reviews. Here is just one of the many examples:

What people are saying about Business Branding 101: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7 created by Louise Anne Maurice of 90 Day Guru E-Learning:

"This course was informative and interesting because the instructor shared brand strategies I have never seen before plus gave examples and shows how to do it. It is very much a hands-on course so I have been able to quickly implement what I have learned. The videos were easy to follow and the instructor generously shares. I walked away with many resources that I will be able to use in my business. I like that I have access to course updates for life."

**************************************************************************************************************
title: Business Branding 101: Building a Brand that Markets 24-7
instructors: 90 Day Guru® E-Learning, Louise Anne Maurice
